entry.title: The Price of Power
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 108,056Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 14

Summary: Athena Carter and Bobby Nash couldn’t be more different. She’s the disciplined “good girl” with her future mapped out, while he’s the dangerous bad boy with one foot in college and the other in the streets. When their worlds start to collide, what begins as a bitter rivalry quickly sparks into something deeper neither of them can ignore. But falling for Bobby means stepping into a world Athena never imagined, one ruled by loyalty and violence. That tested everything she thought she knew about herself. As sparks turn to fire, Athena must decide if love is worth the risk of losing everything.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 110,652Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 14

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 126,573Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 39

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: 20 Questions
entry.summary:
Author: carpediaz

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,398Chapters: 2/4Kudos: 66

Summary: “Alright,” Eddie hums. “You can ask me twenty questions.”“Only twenty questions?” Buck asks, exasperated. “Dude we have to ask each other questions all the time, I’m gonna run out like an hour into our next shift - wait, do I have to ask them all now?”“Twenty personal questions that I promise to answer honestly, as long as you answer the same question - or a contextually similar one - honestly as well. And I reserve the right to decline to answer any two questions until a later date,” Eddie corrects, adding a frankly obscene amount of sugar to his coffee. or The one where a game of 20 Questions shapes Buck and Eddie’s lives together.

entry.title: A soulmate who wasn't meant to be
entry.summary:
Author: JamieNimbus

Summary: When his abuela and tía Pepa suggested taking him and his sisters on vacation with their cousins the last place he expected them to end up was Hershey, PA. Sure, the cold and snow was a nice change to the blistering heat and desert that came from El Paso but seriously? This place was a ghost town. entry.title: Death called to the wolf
entry.summary:
Author: shadowkatninjawarrior

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 149,358Chapters: 65/?Kudos: 1,295

Summary: Evan Buckley was intimately familiar with death. It hung in the air around him, lived under his skin.It was the reason he'd been born in the first place.Maybe it had seemed like some awful cosmic joke to his parents when they'd found out the source of his magic. It could have been anything.It just had to be death.Eddie Diaz doesn't know how to be a werewolf.Which is unfortunate, given he's been one all his life. He brought his son to LA to get away from it all, but he couldn't run from what he was.Or:Death Mage Buck and Werewolf Eddie find one another at the 118.

entry.title: it’s just smoke (and you are melting everything about me)
entry.summary:
Author: sojinyura

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,582Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 23

Summary: "I just thought we were on the same page about dating," Eddie huffs out, tone flatter than intended. "Right," Hen replies, with a wary look. "And what page would that be?" "You know, swearing it off," Eddie's eyes linger on the man's… blue? Yes, blue eyes. Because of course they are. It's like he's escaped right out of Baywatch. "Learning how to be alone." "I don't think that's going very well for you," Ravi mutters, facing away from him.Or, Eddie has some very enlightening conversations… while fighting the literal itch to grow back a mustache.

entry.title: My Life Is Better With You
entry.summary:
Author: TheGreenestBean

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 112,951Chapters: 11/11Kudos: 983

Summary: After returning from Afghanistan Buck and Eddie move to LA to put down roots and in the process build the family they deserve, not the ones they were born with.-“What are you doing here?” Buck asked, “I thought you were going to station six?”Eddie had that shit eating grin he got whenever he was being a cheeky bastard, “Last minute change of plans.” He gave a faux nonchalant shrug.Suddenly Buck’s face fell into a suspicious glare, “You’re not fucking with me, are you? Rocking up to tease me with those abs of yours and then fucking off to your actual station?”Eddie’s smile turned fond, enough confirmation that this was for real, “No, I’m here for good.”“Good, I’ll introduce you then.” Eddie followed Buck as he led him back to the small group, “Everyone this is Eddie Diaz, Eddie this is Hen, Bobby and Chimney.”“I didn’t realise you two knew each other.” Bobby said, analysing the two of them.Eddie and Buck began to laugh in unison, “Know each other?” Buck said, speaking through the laugh.“We share a mortgage.” Eddie finished for him.
